alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:33PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Baton Rouge, north central Iberville and southwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 333 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Allen, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Baker, Port Allen, Addis, Brusly, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Westminster, Erwinville, Inniswold, Merrydale and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 140 and 161. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
